headline.print_headline: Belgium Opts to Double Its Spending on Security
headline.main: Belgium to Double Spending on Police and Intelligence

snippet: The plan seeks to address criticism aired in the wake of the attacks in Paris, but its emphasis on monitoring immigrant areas has proved controversial....
abstract: Belgium announces reforms aimed at addressing police department lapses that allowed Paris attackers to go undetected in country; plan will double spending on police, intelligence and justice departments and add 1,000 officers in canal zone in Brussels by 2019; scheme's emphasis on monitoring immigrant areas has drawn criticism.
lead_paragraph: The plan seeks to address criticism aired in the wake of the attacks in Paris, but its emphasis on monitoring immigrant areas has proved controversial.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: Woman Says She Tipped Off Police
headline.main: Woman Says She Told Police About Paris Attacker’s Hide-Out

snippet: An unidentified woman told BFM-TV that she had told the police where to find Abdelhamid Abaaoud, the ringleader of the Nov. 13 Paris attacks, after visiting him under a bridge....

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

abstract: Unidentified woman claims to be tipster who led French authorities to apartment of Abdelhamid Abaaoud, suspected leader of November 2015 Paris attacks; explains in interview that she decided to come forward because French government has not done enough to help her.
lead_paragraph: An unidentified woman told BFM-TV that she had told the police where to find Abdelhamid Abaaoud, the ringleader of the Nov. 13 Paris attacks, after visiting him under a bridge.

headline.print_headline: Officer Is Cleared in the Death of a Mall Attacker in Minnesota
headline.main: Minnesota Mall Attacker’s Killing by Police Was Justified, Prosecutors Say

snippet: Security footage showed Dahir Adan advancing toward an off-duty police officer in a premeditated attack, probably prompted by his radicalization....

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

abstract: Prosecutors clear Minnesota Police Officer Jason Falconer of wrongdoing in shooting of Dahir Adan, man who carried out stabbing rampage at mall in St Cloud, Minn, in September; investigators remain uncertain of Adan's motives and whether he had ties to Islamic State or other extremists.
lead_paragraph: Security footage showed Dahir Adan advancing toward an off-duty police officer in a premeditated attack, probably prompted by his radicalization.

headline.print_headline: Attack Suspect Carried Writings  Endorsing Jihad
headline.main: Ahmad Khan Rahami Was Inspired by Bin Laden, Charges Say

snippet: One day after Mr. Rahami, the suspect in the Manhattan and New Jersey bombings, was taken into custody, investigators on Tuesday were learning more about what might have motivated the attack....
abstract: Chelsea bomber Ahmad Khan Rahami is charged in federal court with crimes including use of weapons of mass destruction and bombing place of public use; complaint states Rahami was motivated by extremist Islamic ideology that was recorded in notebook found when he was captured by police; charges come day after disclosure that Rahami's father in 2014 told FBI that his son was terrorist, prompting review that found no grounds for further inquiry.
lead_paragraph: One day after Mr. Rahami, the suspect in the Manhattan and New Jersey bombings, was taken into custody, investigators on Tuesday were learning more about what might have motivated the attack.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Rukmini Callimachi, Annie Correal, Elizabeth A. Harris, Joseph Goldstein, Sarah Maslin Nir, Julia Preston, William K. Rashbaum, Rick Rojas, Eli Rosenberg, Nate Schweber, Scott Shane and Benjamin Weiser.
byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and ADAM GOLDMAN

snippet: Ahmad Khan Rahami, 28, was arrested in connection with explosions in New York and New Jersey over the weekend. Neighbors described him as a friendly car enthusiast and were surprised by the arrest....
lead_paragraph: Ahmad Khan Rahami, 28, was arrested in connection with explosions in New York and New Jersey over the weekend. Neighbors described him as a friendly car enthusiast and were surprised by the arrest.

byline.original: By YOUSUR AL-HLOU, SHANE O'NEILL and MEGAN SPECIA

headline.print_headline: Texas Mourns 2: A Boy With a Powerful Baseball Swing and His Father
headline.main: Texas Boy Known as ‘Copeland Crush’ and His Father Are Mourned

snippet: Brodie Copeland, 11, a baseball player, and his father, Sean, were identified as American victims of the attack in Nice, France....
abstract: Lakeway, Texas, community mourns deaths of Sean Copeland and his 11-year-old son Brodie Copeland, only two Americans confirmed dead in attack in Nice, France.
lead_paragraph: Brodie Copeland, 11, a baseball player, and his father, Sean, were identified as American victims of the attack in Nice, France.

byline.contributor: David Montgomery reported from Austin, and Christine Hauser from New York. Niraj Chokshi contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By DAVID MONTGOMERY and CHRISTINE HAUSER

headline.main: Truck Attack in Nice, France: What We Know, and What We Don’t

snippet: Although the Islamic State has claimed responsibility, the motives of the attacker, Mohamed Lahouaiej Bouhlel, remain unclear....
lead_paragraph: Although the Islamic State has claimed responsibility, the motives of the attacker, Mohamed Lahouaiej Bouhlel, remain unclear.

headline.print_headline: ‘That Ignoramus’: 2 French Scholars of Radical Islam Turn Bitter Rivals
headline.main: ‘That Ignoramus’: 2 French Scholars of Radical Islam Turn Bitter Rivals

snippet: A falling-out between the academics, Olivier Roy and Gilles Kepel, presents an important question: Which man holds the key to understanding the phenomenon?...
abstract: Memo From Paris; distinguished French academics and former friends Olivier Roy and Gilles Kepel have become bitter rivals over stark disagreement about what motivates Islamic terrorists; scope of debate extends beyond theory and shapes France's response to palpable threat.
lead_paragraph: A falling-out between the academics, Olivier Roy and Gilles Kepel, presents an important question: Which man holds the key to understanding the phenomenon?

snippet: You wouldn’t call me anti-Dutch just because I don’t like Gouda....
lead_paragraph: You wouldn’t call me anti-Dutch just because I don’t like Gouda.

headline.print_headline: With Final Goodbyes to Shooting Victims, a Stark Reckoning for Loved Ones
headline.main: With Final Goodbyes in Orlando, a Stark Reckoning for Loved Ones

snippet: After grappling with shock and anger, the families and friends of those killed in Orlando find themselves confronting the raw emotions of saying goodbye....
abstract: Family and friends of Orlando massacre victims begin to attend the funerals and wakes that will provide chance to say final farewells and begin to reckon with fact of their loved ones' deaths.
lead_paragraph: After grappling with shock and anger, the families and friends of those killed in Orlando find themselves confronting the raw emotions of saying goodbye.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and DAMIEN CAVE
